verses.text: \w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w said|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Verily|strong="G0281"\+w* \+w I say|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w unto you|strong="G5213"\+w*, \+w That|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w there be|strong="G1526"\+w* \+w some|strong="G5100"\+w* \+w of them that stand|strong="G2476"\+w* \+w here|strong="G5602"\+w*, \+w which|strong="G3748"\+w* \+w shall|strong="G1089"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3361"\+w* \+w taste|strong="G1089"\+w* \+w of death|strong="G2288"\+w*, \+w till|strong="G0302"\+w* \+w they have seen|strong="G1492"\+w* \+w the kingdom|strong="G0932"\+w* \+w of God|strong="G2316"\+w* \+w come|strong="G2064"\+w* \+w with|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w power|strong="G1411"\+w*.\wj*

¶ \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w after|strong="G3326"\w* \w six|strong="G1803"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w taketh|strong="G3880"\w* \add with him\add* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w James|strong="G2385"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w John|strong="G2491"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w leadeth|strong="G0399"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w up|strong="G0399"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w an|strong="G3735"\w* \w high|strong="G5308"\w* \w mountain|strong="G3735"\w* \w apart|strong="G3441"\w* \w by|strong="G2596"\w* \w themselves|strong="G2398"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* he was \w transfigured|strong="G3339"\w* \w before|strong="G1715"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w raiment|strong="G2440"\w* \w became|strong="G1096"\w* \w shining|strong="G4744"\w*, \w exceeding|strong="G3029"\w* \w white|strong="G3022"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w snow|strong="G5510"\w*; so \w as|strong="G3634"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w fuller|strong="G1102"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w earth|strong="G1093"\w* \w can|strong="G1410"\w* white \w them|strong="G3021"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* there \w appeared|strong="G3700"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w Elias|strong="G2243"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w Moses|strong="G3475"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* they \w were|strong="G2258"\w* \w talking|strong="G4814"\w* with \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* and \w said|strong="G3004"\w* to \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \w Master|strong="G4461"\w*, it \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w good|strong="G2570"\w* for \w us|strong="G2248"\w* to \w be|strong="G1511"\w* \w here|strong="G5602"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* let us \w make|strong="G4160"\w* \w three|strong="G5140"\w* \w tabernacles|strong="G4633"\w*; \w one|strong="G1520"\w* for \w thee|strong="G4671"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* for \w Moses|strong="G3475"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* for \w Elias|strong="G2243"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* he \w wist|strong="G1492"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w what|strong="G5101"\w* to \w say|strong="G2980"\w*; \w for|strong="G1063"\w* they \w were|strong="G2258"\w* sore \w afraid|strong="G1630"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* there \w was|strong="G1096"\w* a \w cloud|strong="G3507"\w* that \w overshadowed|strong="G1982"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* a \w voice|strong="G5456"\w* \w came|strong="G2064"\w* out \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w cloud|strong="G3507"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w This|strong="G3778"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w beloved|strong="G0027"\w* \w Son|strong="G5207"\w*: \w hear|strong="G0191"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w suddenly|strong="G1819"\w*, when they had looked round \w about|strong="G4017"\w*, they \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* no \w man|strong="G3762"\w* any \w more|strong="G3765"\w*, \w save|strong="G0235"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w only|strong="G3441"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w themselves|strong="G1438"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w as|strong="G2597"\w* they came \w down|strong="G0846"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* the \w mountain|strong="G3735"\w*, he \w charged|strong="G1291"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* they should \w tell|strong="G1334"\w* no \w man|strong="G3367"\w* what \w things|strong="G3739"\w* they had \w seen|strong="G1492"\w*, \w till|strong="G3752"\w* the \w Son|strong="G5207"\w* of \w man|strong="G0444"\w* were \w risen|strong="G0450"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* the \w dead|strong="G3498"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* they \w kept|strong="G2902"\w* that \w saying|strong="G3056"\w* \w with|strong="G4314"\w* \w themselves|strong="G1438"\w*, questioning one with \w another|strong="G4802"\w* \w what|strong="G5101"\w* the \w rising|strong="G0450"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* the \w dead|strong="G3498"\w* should \w mean|strong="G2076"\w*.

¶ \w And|strong="G2532"\w* they \w asked|strong="G1905"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Why|strong="G3754"\w* \w say|strong="G3004"\w* the \w scribes|strong="G1122"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w Elias|strong="G2243"\w* \w must|strong="G1163"\w* \w first|strong="G4412"\w* \w come|strong="G2064"\w*?

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* he \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* and \w told|strong="G2036"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Elias|strong="G2243"\+w* \+w verily|strong="G3303"\+w* \+w cometh|strong="G2064"\+w* \+w first|strong="G4412"\+w*, \+w and restoreth|strong="G0600"\+w* \+w all things|strong="G3956"\+w*; \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w how|strong="G4459"\+w* \+w it is written|strong="G1125"\+w* \+w of|strong="G1909"\+w* \+w the Son|strong="G5207"\+w* \+w of man|strong="G0444"\+w*, \+w that|strong="G2443"\+w* \+w he must suffer|strong="G3958"\+w* \+w many things|strong="G4183"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w be set at nought|strong="G1847"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w But|strong="G0235"\+w* \+w I say|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w unto you|strong="G5213"\+w*, \+w That|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w Elias|strong="G2243"\+w* \+w is|strong="G2064"\+w* \+w indeed|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w come|strong="G2064"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w they have done|strong="G4160"\+w* \+w unto him|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w whatsoever|strong="G3745"\+w* \+w they listed|strong="G2309"\+w*, \+w as|strong="G2531"\+w* \+w it is written|strong="G1125"\+w* \+w of|strong="G1909"\+w* \+w him|strong="G0846"\+w*.\wj*

¶ \w And|strong="G2532"\w* when he \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \add his\add* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w*, he \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* \w a|strong="G3793"\w* \w great|strong="G4183"\w* \w multitude|strong="G3793"\w* \w about|strong="G4012"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w scribes|strong="G1122"\w* \w questioning|strong="G4802"\w* with \w them|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w straightway|strong="G2112"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w people|strong="G3793"\w*, when they \w beheld|strong="G1492"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, were greatly \w amazed|strong="G1568"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* running \w to|strong="G4370"\w* \add him\add* \w saluted|strong="G0782"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w asked|strong="G1905"\w* the \w scribes|strong="G1122"\w*, \wj  \+w What|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w question ye|strong="G4802"\+w* \+w with|strong="G4314"\+w* \+w them|strong="G0846"\+w*?\wj*

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w multitude|strong="G3793"\w* \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* and \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \w Master|strong="G1320"\w*, I have \w brought|strong="G5342"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w thee|strong="G4571"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w son|strong="G5207"\w*, which \w hath|strong="G2192"\w* \w a|strong="G4151"\w* \w dumb|strong="G0216"\w* \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w*;

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w wheresoever|strong="G0302"\w* he \w taketh|strong="G2638"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, he \w teareth|strong="G4486"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* he \w foameth|strong="G0875"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w gnasheth|strong="G5149"\w* \w with|strong="G3599"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w teeth|strong="G3599"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* pineth \w away|strong="G3583"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* I \w spake|strong="G2036"\w* \w to|strong="G3101"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* they should \w cast|strong="G1544"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w out|strong="G1544"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* they \w could|strong="G2480"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w*.

He \w answereth|strong="G0611"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w saith|strong="G3004"\w*, \wj  \+w O|strong="G5599"\+w* \+w faithless|strong="G0571"\+w* \+w generation|strong="G1074"\+w*, \+w how long|strong="G4219"\+w* \+w shall I be|strong="G2071"\+w* \+w with|strong="G4314"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5209"\+w*? \+w how long|strong="G4219"\+w* \+w shall I suffer|strong="G0430"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5216"\+w*? \+w bring|strong="G5342"\+w* \+w him|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w unto|strong="G4314"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3165"\+w*.\wj*

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* they \w brought|strong="G5342"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* when he \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w straightway|strong="G2112"\w* the \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w tare|strong="G4682"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* he \w fell|strong="G4098"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* the \w ground|strong="G1093"\w*, and \w wallowed|strong="G2947"\w* \w foaming|strong="G0875"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w asked|strong="G1905"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w father|strong="G3962"\w*, \wj  \+w How long|strong="G4214"\+w* \+w is it|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w ago|strong="G5550"\+w* \+w since|strong="G5613"\+w* \+w this|strong="G5124"\+w* \+w came|strong="G1096"\+w* \+w unto him|strong="G0846"\+w*?\wj* \w And|strong="G1161"\w* he \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, Of a \w child|strong="G3812"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w ofttimes|strong="G4178"\w* it hath \w cast|strong="G0906"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w fire|strong="G4442"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w waters|strong="G5204"\w*, \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w destroy|strong="G0622"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*: \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* thou canst \w do|strong="G1410"\w* any \w thing|strong="G5100"\w*, have \w compassion|strong="G4697"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w*, and \w help|strong="G0997"\w* \w us|strong="G2254"\w*.

\w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w If|strong="G1487"\+w* \+w thou canst|strong="G1410"\+w* \+w believe|strong="G4100"\+w*, \+w all things|strong="G3956"\+w* \+add are\+add* \+w possible|strong="G1415"\+w* \+w to him that believeth|strong="G4100"\+w*.\wj*

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w straightway|strong="G2112"\w* the \w father|strong="G3962"\w* of the \w child|strong="G3813"\w* cried \w out|strong="G2896"\w*, and \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w tears|strong="G1144"\w*, \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, I \w believe|strong="G4100"\w*; help \w thou|strong="G0997"\w* \w mine|strong="G3450"\w* \w unbelief|strong="G0570"\w*.

\w When|strong="G1161"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* the \w people|strong="G3793"\w* came running \w together|strong="G1998"\w*, he \w rebuked|strong="G2008"\w* \w the|strong="G4151"\w* \w foul|strong="G0169"\w* \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+add Thou\+add* \+w dumb|strong="G0216"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w deaf|strong="G2974"\+w* \+w spirit|strong="G4151"\+w*, \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w charge|strong="G2004"\+w* \+w thee|strong="G4671"\+w*, \+w come out|strong="G1831"\+w* \+w of|strong="G1537"\+w* \+w him|strong="G0846"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w enter|strong="G1525"\+w* \+w no more|strong="G3371"\+w* \+w into|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w him|strong="G0846"\+w*.\wj*

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \add the spirit\add* \w cried|strong="G2896"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w rent|strong="G4682"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w sore|strong="G4183"\w*, and came \w out|strong="G1831"\w* of him: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* he \w was|strong="G1096"\w* \w as|strong="G5616"\w* one \w dead|strong="G3498"\w*; insomuch \w that|strong="G5620"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w said|strong="G3754"\w*, He is \w dead|strong="G0599"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w took|strong="G2902"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* by the \w hand|strong="G5495"\w*, and \w lifted|strong="G1453"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w up|strong="G1453"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* he \w arose|strong="G0450"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w when|strong="G1525"\w* he was \w come|strong="G0846"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w house|strong="G3624"\w*, \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w asked|strong="G1905"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w privately|strong="G2596"\w*, \w Why|strong="G3754"\w* \w could|strong="G1410"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w cast|strong="G1544"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w out|strong="G1544"\w*?

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w This|strong="G5124"\+w* \+w kind|strong="G1085"\+w* \+w can|strong="G1410"\+w* \+w come forth|strong="G1831"\+w* \+w by|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w nothing|strong="G3762"\+w*, \+w but|strong="G3361"\+w* \+w by|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w prayer|strong="G4335"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w fasting|strong="G3521"\+w*.\wj*

¶ \w And|strong="G2532"\w* they \w departed|strong="G1831"\w* \w thence|strong="G1564"\w*, and \w passed|strong="G3899"\w* \w through|strong="G1223"\w* \w Galilee|strong="G1056"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* he \w would|strong="G2309"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* any \w man|strong="G5100"\w* should \w know|strong="G1097"\w* \add it\add*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* he \w taught|strong="G1321"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w The Son|strong="G5207"\+w* \+w of man|strong="G0444"\+w* \+w is delivered|strong="G3860"\+w* \+w into|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w the hands|strong="G5495"\+w* \+w of men|strong="G0444"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w they shall kill|strong="G0615"\+w* \+w him|strong="G0846"\+w*; \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w after that he is killed|strong="G0615"\+w*, \+w he shall rise|strong="G0450"\+w* \+w the|strong="G2250"\+w* \+w third|strong="G5154"\+w* \+w day|strong="G2250"\+w*.\wj*

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w they|strong="G3588"\w* understood \w not|strong="G0050"\w* that \w saying|strong="G4487"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* were \w afraid|strong="G5399"\w* to \w ask|strong="G1905"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

¶ \w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Capernaum|strong="G2584"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w being|strong="G1096"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w house|strong="G3614"\w* he \w asked|strong="G1905"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w What was it that|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w ye disputed|strong="G1260"\+w* \+w among|strong="G4314"\+w* \+w yourselves|strong="G1438"\+w* \+w by|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w the way|strong="G3598"\+w*?\wj*

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w they|strong="G3588"\w* held their \w peace|strong="G4623"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* the \w way|strong="G3598"\w* they had \w disputed|strong="G1256"\w* \w among|strong="G4314"\w* \w themselves|strong="G0240"\w*, \w who|strong="G5101"\w* \add should be\add* the \w greatest|strong="G3187"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he sat \w down|strong="G2523"\w*, and \w called|strong="G5455"\w* the \w twelve|strong="G1427"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w If|strong="G1487"\+w* \+w any man|strong="G5100"\+w* \+w desire|strong="G2309"\+w* \+w to be|strong="G1511"\+w* \+w first|strong="G4413"\+w*, \+add the same\+add* \+w shall be|strong="G2071"\+w* \+w last|strong="G2078"\+w* \+w of all|strong="G3956"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w servant|strong="G1249"\+w* \+w of all|strong="G3956"\+w*.\wj*

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w took|strong="G2983"\w* a \w child|strong="G3813"\w*, and \w set|strong="G2476"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w midst|strong="G3319"\w* of \w them|strong="G0846"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* when he had \w taken|strong="G1723"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* in his \w arms|strong="G1723"\w*, he \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*,
